thanks, Jim et al,

All kidding aside, there is nothing wrong with Shoami, right ?
Sort of like " Bungo Takada swords " of tsuba world ?

Question regarding the yagyu guard.............
Besides the quality of the iron + the " masame like bones ? " on the 
mimi, why Yagyu ?  
To my untrained eyes, the design looks Shoami or certainly not the 
usual waves based design that's typical of that school.
Is that particular design listed in the Yagyu design book ?  An old 
timer told me there's such a book.  True ?

Again, thanks, it was fun making copies........just like that 
character in Saturday Live.


milt
